## Transaction.applySignature() method

Applies the signature on the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
applySignature(signature: ISignature | Uint8Array): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signature | [ISignature](./sdk-core.isignature.md) \| Uint8Array | The signature, as computed by a signer. |

**Returns:**

void
